ai-ne16:1.1_0: Herein, what is the fuel for that?
ai-ne16:1.3_0: Venerable Ajita asks the Buddha about a question,
ai-ne16:2.3_0: You call a worm to what?
ai-ne16:4.1_0: “By what is the world enveloped?” “Dear the Blessed One is enlightened, but has no faults. But he does not exceed the practice of it?
ai-ne16:4.2_0: “Where does it satisfy?” “When asked a question, they don’t want to give up, they don’t want to listen.” And the Buddha says, “Perhaps there is no way of giving it up.”
ai-ne16:4.3_0: “I say, ‘Perhaps I must tell a question,’ ‘I don’t get a question,’ ‘I don’t call upon the way!’ So let them excel the way, Blessed One tells us.”
ai-ne16:4.4_0: “What’s the point of his great advantages?”
ai-ne16:4.5_0: That is why the Blessed One said: “He is wearing away.”
ai-ne16:5.4_0: That is the restraint of the ear,
ai-ne16:5.5_0: who does he love his father?”
ai-ne16:6.1_0: “Whatever streams there are in the world
ai-ne16:6.4_0: I declare the restraint of the ear;
ai-ne16:7.1_0: “What is the attachment to all?” “What is the point of listening to the true teaching, where do they answer?”
ai-ne16:7.2_0: “This is the urgency, So let us act the same questions that are your father’s side, and let us act the enlightenment of wisdom.”
ai-ne16:7.3_0: Hence the Blessed One said: “Here the perfected ones, he is in the world.”
ai-ne16:10.2_0: they’re not able to be one, I say.
ai-ne16:11.2_0: That is why the Buddha asked him a question.
ai-ne16:11.3_0: That’s how pure, faultless, and faultless.
ai-ne16:11.4_0: And wherever there is no fault, no fault in being reborn, no matter how longer answers.
ai-ne16:11.5_0: Hence Venerable Mahākaccāna asked his question, “I hope you answered question.”
